entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@JasonSCampbell Because if someone who is (checks notes) 36 and is #BenShapiro dies of #Covid19 well he's a heartless bastard and who gives a toss? 

Also he doesn't understand life expectancy. 80 is life expectancy at ago 0; if you're already 79 it's significantly older than 80.
